casebody.data:
OSTBY & BARTON COMPANY and American Associates, Inc., Plaintiffs-Appellants, v. Thoger Gronberg JUNGERSEN, Defendant-Appellant. Nos. 9222, 9223. Circuit Court of Appeals, Third Circuit. Argued Feb. 21, 1947. Decided Sept. 5, 1947. John Vaughan Groner, of New York City (Edward Winsor, of Providence, R. I.,, on the brief), for plaintiffs-appellants. Drury W. Cooper, of New York City (John N. Cooper, of New York City, on, the brief), for defendant-cross-appellant. Karl W. Flocks, of Washington, D. C., for Thoger Grcnberg Jungersen.

Before MARIS and KALODNER, Circuit Judges, and FOLLMER, District Judge.

PER CURIAM.

For the reasons stated in the opinion of Judge Meancy, 65 F.Supp. 652, the judgment of the District Court will be affirmed..
